title: 一登陆服务器就崩了
txt_content:
# # A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment: # #  SIGSEGV (0xb) at pc=0x000000000000bb4e, pid=47, tid=0x00007fbec5b05b10 # # JRE version: OpenJDK Runtime Environment (8.0_212-b04) (build 1.8.0_212-b04) # Java VM: OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM (25.212-b04 mixed mode linux-amd64 compressed oops) # Derivative: IcedTea 3.12.0 # Distribution: Custom build (Sat May  4 17:33:35 UTC 2019) # Problematic frame: # C  0x000000000000bb4e # # Core dump written. Default location: /data/core or core.47 # # An error report file with more information is saved as: # /data/hs_err_pid47.log # # If you would like to submit a bug report, please include # instructions on how to reproduce the bug and visit: #   https://icedtea.classpath.org/bugzilla
#
复制代码没啥好说的 运行环境 Linux Debian 10 其他上面有 描述里的文件在里面(不压缩传不上qwq) logs.zip (339.15 KB, 下载次数: 9) 2020-3-4 20:11 上传 点击文件名下载附件 好大,不压缩还传不上

replies.txt_content: 你没有加一个核心 那个版本的 我找下发给你

首先检查你的mod文件夹里面有没有安装这两个MOD 
https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-716583-1-1.html
https://www.mcmod.cn/class/562.html

replies.txt_content:

有可能是java支持库不全
